name: Goodra
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

abilities.name: Gooey Regeneration
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, heal 60 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Heavy Whip
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.
